name: 尘世界 Dust world
description:
Dust World is a plot puzzle game. If you like solving puzzles, welcome to experience.

Introduction to the game


The old man said that there used to be monsters in this world.

Some people have set an iron example: after the founding of the People's Republic, you are not allowed to become refined. Later, he divided the world with great magic and magic power, driving all the supernatural into another world

Now there is no supernatural, this is the age of mortals, only mortals will live forever. All supernatural beings become legends and disappear in the dust of history

But did the supernatural disappear completely?

It's not so easy. There are seven mysterious masks in the world as tickets to the world that disappeared in the dust.

All life has its end point, just like the day when the sun goes out, the world is going to die

A group of people struggling to survive

Game features


Three endings. (Warm tip: unlock the real ending through the first two endings, and just play again directly from Chapter 4.).
Minor terrorist elements
The puzzle is closely combined with the plot

Operation mode

Click with the mouse, and use props to interact with scene characters to complete various puzzles and explore the truth.

With so much said, this is just a strange stitching.
Say so much, this is a little bit of puzzle game.
To say so much is just a person's self congratulation.
